sentences.en: I often take a walk in the evening.
We have dinner together every evening.
sentences.zh: 我们每天晚上一起吃晚饭。

sentences.en: She says 'Good evening!' when meeting friends at night.
sentences.zh: 她晚上见到朋友时会说“晚上好！”。

sentences.en: We often hear 'Good evening!' at the start of a dinner party.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在晚宴开始时听到“晚上好！”。

sentences.en: How are you today?
How do you spell your name?
They are my friends.
These books are interesting.
Can you help me?
You are my friend.
How are you? This is a common greeting used to ask about someone's wellbeing.
sentences.zh: How are you? 这是一个用来询问某人健康状况的常见问候语。

sentences.en: When you meet someone, you can say 'How are you?' to start a conversation.
sentences.zh: 当你遇到某人时，你可以说“How are you?”来开始一段对话。

sentences.en: I am a student.
I like reading books.
I get up in the morning.
She goes to school in the am.
I feel fine today.
The weather is fine.
Thanks for your help.
She says thanks to her teacher.
OK, let's start the class.
She said OK to the plan.
What is your name?
What time is it now?
She is a teacher.
This is my book.
I like this book.
This is my pen.
I live in a big house.
She is in the classroom now.
English is a global language.
sentences.zh: 英语是一门全球性的语言。

sentences.en: I learn English every day.
This word is in English.
sentences.zh: 这个单词是用英语写的。

sentences.en: We learn to read in English.
Can you show me the map?
sentences.zh: 你能给我看一下地图吗？

sentences.en: We use a map to find directions.
sentences.zh: 我们用地图来寻找方向。

sentences.en: I drink water with a cup.
The cup is on the table.
I use a ruler to draw straight lines.
The ruler on the desk is red.
sentences.zh: 桌子上的尺子是红色的。

sentences.en: I need a pen to write.
sentences.zh: 我需要一支钢笔来写字。

sentences.en: This pen is red.
I like to eat an orange.
The orange is round and juicy.
She wears a warm jacket in winter.
sentences.zh: 她冬天穿一件暖和的夹克衫。

sentences.en: My new jacket has two pockets.
sentences.zh: 我的新夹克有两个口袋。

sentences.en: The key opens the door.
I need a key to lock the box.
sentences.zh: 我需要一把钥匙来锁盒子。

sentences.en: She covered herself with a warm quilt.
sentences.zh: 她用一床温暖的被子盖住自己。

sentences.en: My grandmother made a beautiful quilt for me.
sentences.zh: 我奶奶为我做了一床漂亮的被子。

sentences.en: I like it.
It is a cat.

zh: （用于单数可数名词前，表示未曾提到的）一（人、事、物）

sentences.en: This is a book.
I see a cat.
I like that book.
Is that your pen?
Can you spell your name?
I need to learn how to spell this word.
sentences.zh: 我需要学习如何拼写这个单词。

sentences.en: Please pass me the book.
Please be quiet in the library.
The sky is a beautiful color.
sentences.zh: 天空是一种美丽的颜色。

sentences.en: I like to draw with different color pencils.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢用不同颜色的铅笔画画。

sentences.en: The apple is red.
Her dress is red.
The sun is yellow.
I like yellow flowers.
The grass is green in spring.
I like the green apple.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢这个绿色的苹果。

sentences.en: The sky is blue.
She has a blue pen.
The cat is black.
Her hair is black.
The snow is white.
She wears a white dress.
sentences.zh: 她穿着一条白色的连衣裙。

sentences.en: The grape is purple.
She likes purple flowers.
The bear has brown fur.
She likes to wear a brown coat in winter.
sentences.zh: 她冬天喜欢穿一件棕色的外套。

zh: 指已提到或易领会到的人或事物

sentences.en: The cat is on the mat.
I read the book yesterday.
I am doing homework now.
She is reading a book now.
I see a red apple.
Can you see the bird in the tree?
I can swim fast.
She can sing a song.
I can say hello to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我可以向我的朋友说你好。

sentences.en: Please say your name slowly.
This is my book.
My favorite color is blue.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的颜色是蓝色。

sentences.en: Can you tell me your name?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我你的名字吗？

sentences.en: My name is Tom.
She gave me a nice smile.
sentences.zh: 她给了我一个友好的微笑。

sentences.en: We had a nice day at the park.
sentences.zh: 我们在公园度过了愉快的一天。

zh: 常用于原形动词之前，表示该动词为不定式

sentences.en: I need to go to the park.
She gives a book to her friend.
sentences.zh: 她把一本书给了她的朋友。

sentences.en: I want to meet my friends after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我想见我的朋友们。

sentences.en: We will meet at the park tomorrow morning.
sentences.zh: 我们明天早上将在公园见面。

sentences.en: I ate too much cake.
She is too tired to walk.
sentences.zh: 她太累了以至于走不动。

sentences.en: Is this your book?
Your smile is nice.

zh: （用于女子的姓氏或姓名前，不指明婚否）女士

sentences.en: Ms. Smith is our English teacher.
sentences.zh: 史密斯女士是我们的英语老师。

sentences.en: Can you pass the book to Ms. Lee?
sentences.zh: 你能把书递给李女士吗？

sentences.en: This is his book.
His name is Tom.
I like apples and bananas.
She is tall and thin.
Her name is Lily.
I gave her a book.
Yes, I understand.
Yes, that's correct.
She is reading a book.
She likes playing basketball.
He is a boy.
He likes apples.
The answer to the question is no.
sentences.zh: 这个问题的答案是否定的。

sentences.en: She shook her head to say no.
I am not happy today.
She does not like apples.
The temperature is zero degrees Celsius today.
Zero is the number that comes before one.
I have one apple.
There is one book on the desk.
I have two apples.
There are two books on the desk.
I have three apples.
There are three books on the desk.
There are four seasons in a year.
I have four apples in my bag.
I have five apples.
There are five books on the desk.
I have six apples.
There are six books on the desk.
There are seven days in a week.
I have seven apples.
There are eight apples on the table.
I need eight pencils for my class.
I have nine apples.
There are nine birds in the tree.
I need to call my friend, so I use the telephone.
sentences.zh: 我需要给朋友打电话，所以我用电话。

sentences.en: The telephone rings loudly, and my mom answers it.
sentences.zh: 电话铃大声响了，我妈妈接了电话。

sentences.en: I need to count the number of apples.
The number of students in the class is thirty.
sentences.zh: 班里学生的数量是三十。

sentences.en: I use my phone to call my friend.
sentences.zh: 我用我的手机给朋友打电话。

sentences.en: My phone can take photos and send messages.
sentences.zh: 我的手机可以拍照和发送信息。

sentences.en: Please write down your telephone number on the paper.
sentences.zh: 请把你的电话号码写在纸上。

sentences.en: My mother's phone number is easy to remember.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈的电话号码很容易记住。

sentences.en: The first day of school is exciting.
sentences.zh: 开学的第一天很令人兴奋。

sentences.en: She got the first prize in the race.
sentences.zh: 她在比赛中获得了第一名。

sentences.en: My first name is Tom.
Please tell me your first name.
This is the last book on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 这是书架上的最后一本书。

sentences.en: She was the last to arrive at the party.
sentences.zh: 她是最后一个到达派对的。

sentences.en: Smith is a common last name in Englishspeaking countries.
sentences.zh: 史密斯是英语国家常见的姓氏。

sentences.en: You should write your last name first on this form.
sentences.zh: 你应该在这张表格上先写你的姓氏。

sentences.en: My friend and I play together.
She is a good friend.
China is a country in East Asia.
sentences.zh: 中国是东亚的一个国家。

sentences.en: The capital of China is Beijing.
The cat is in the middle of the road.
She sits in the middle of the classroom.
I go to school every day.
Our school has a big playground.
sentences.zh: 我们的学校有一个大操场。

sentences.en: I study in a middle school.
Middle school students usually have seven classes a day.
sentences.zh: 中学生通常一天有七节课。

sentences.en: My sister is a student.
sentences.zh: 我的姐姐/妹妹是一名学生。

sentences.en: She has a kind sister.
sentences.zh: 她有一个善良的姐姐/妹妹。

sentences.en: My mother cooks delicious food for me every day.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈每天为我做美味的食物。

sentences.en: I love my mother very much.
My father is tall and kind.
I often play football with my father.
sentences.zh: 我经常和爸爸一起踢足球。

sentences.en: My parent takes care of me every day.
I love to talk with my parent about my school life.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和我的父母谈论我的学校生活。

sentences.en: My brother is playing football.
She has a kind brother.
My grandmother likes cooking for the family.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶喜欢为家人做饭。

sentences.en: I often visit my grandmother on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我经常在周末去看望我的奶奶。

sentences.en: My grandfather tells me stories every night.
sentences.zh: 我的爷爷每晚给我讲故事。

sentences.en: I often visit my grandfather on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我经常在周末去看望爷爷。

sentences.en: My grandparent tells me stories every night.
sentences.zh: 我的祖父母每晚给我讲故事。

sentences.en: I visit my grandparent on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我周末去看望我的祖父母。

sentences.en: My family is very important to me.
sentences.zh: 我的家庭对我非常重要。

sentences.en: We often have dinner together as a family.
sentences.zh: 我们家人经常一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: Those books are on the desk.
I like those red apples.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢那些红色的苹果。

sentences.en: Who is that girl?
Who helped you with your homework?
Oh, that's a cute cat!
Oh, I see what you mean now.
sentences.zh: 哦，我现在明白你的意思了。

sentences.en: These are my books.
I like these apples.
They are playing in the park.
They like to read books together.
Well, how are you today?
She did well in the exam.
I have a book.
They have two apples.
I go to school every day.
Today is a sunny day.
“Have a good day!” is a common way to wish someone well.
sentences.zh: “Have a good day!”是一种常见的祝福他人的方式。

sentences.en: When parting, you can say “Have a good day!” to your friends.
sentences.zh: 当分别时，你可以对你的朋友说“Have a good day!”。

sentences.en: She said bye before leaving.
We wave and say bye to each other.
My son is playing in the park.
sentences.zh: 我的儿子正在公园里玩。

sentences.en: She has a son who likes reading.
sentences.zh: 她有一个喜欢读书的儿子。

zh: 堂兄（弟、姊、妹）；表兄（弟、姊、妹）

phrases.zh: 我的堂兄/堂弟/堂姐/堂妹/表哥/表弟/表姐/表妹
堂兄/堂弟/堂姐/堂妹/表哥/表弟/表姐/表妹的书

sentences.en: My cousin and I often play basketball together.
sentences.zh: 我和我的堂兄（或表兄）经常一起打篮球。

sentences.en: She visited her cousin in New York last summer.
sentences.zh: 她去年夏天去纽约看望了她的堂姐（或表姐）。

sentences.en: My grandpa tells me stories every night.
sentences.zh: 我的爷爷每晚给我讲故事。

sentences.en: Grandpa likes to work in the garden.
sentences.zh: 爷爷喜欢在花园里干活。

sentences.en: My mom cooks delicious food for me.
sentences.zh: 我的妈妈为我做美味的食物。

sentences.en: I love my mom very much.

zh: 姑母；姨母；伯母；婶母；舅母

sentences.en: My aunt often cooks delicious meals for me.
sentences.zh: 我的阿姨经常给我做美味的饭菜。

sentences.en: She is my mother's sister, so she is my aunt.
sentences.zh: 她是我妈妈的妹妹，所以她是我的阿姨。

sentences.en: My grandma tells me stories every night.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶每晚给我讲故事。

sentences.en: Grandma bakes delicious cookies for us.
sentences.zh: 奶奶为我们烤美味的饼干。

sentences.en: My dad is a kind man.
sentences.zh: 我的爸爸是一个善良的人。

sentences.en: Dad often tells me stories.

zh: 舅父；叔父；伯父；姑父；姨父

sentences.en: My uncle is a doctor.
I often visit my uncle on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我经常在周末去看望我的叔叔。

sentences.en: My daughter is five years old.
She loves her daughter very much.

zh: （用以介绍某人或某物）这就是；在这里

sentences.en: You can put your things here.
sentences.zh: 你可以把你的东西放在这里。

sentences.en: Come here and sit down, please.
I took a photo of the beautiful sunset.
sentences.zh: 我拍了一张美丽日落的照片。

sentences.en: She showed me her favorite photo album.
sentences.zh: 她给我看了她最喜欢的相册。

zh: 属于（某人或某物）；关于（某人或某物）

sentences.en: A cup of tea is on the table.
The first day of school is exciting.
sentences.zh: 开学的第一天很令人兴奋。

sentences.en: The next step is to read the book.
What is the next lesson?
I draw a picture with a pencil.
The picture on the wall is beautiful.
The girl is playing in the park.
sentences.zh: 这个女孩正在公园里玩。

sentences.en: I see a happy girl over there.
sentences.zh: 我看到那边有一个快乐的女孩。

sentences.en: The dog is barking loudly.
I like to play with my pet dog.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和我的宠物狗一起玩。

sentences.en: I use a pencil to draw a picture.
The pencil is on the desk.
I like reading a book.
This is my new book.
I need an eraser to correct my mistake.
sentences.zh: 我需要一块橡皮来改正我的错误。

sentences.en: The eraser is on the desk next to the pencil.
sentences.zh: 橡皮在桌子上，铅笔旁边。

sentences.en: I put the book in the box.
The box is red and big.
I put my pencils in the pencil box.
sentences.zh: 我把我的铅笔放进铅笔盒里。

sentences.en: The pencil box is on the desk.
I put my books in the schoolbag.
She carries a red schoolbag to school every day.
sentences.zh: 她每天背着一个红色的书包去上学。

sentences.en: A dictionary helps us find the meaning of new words.
sentences.zh: 词典帮助我们查找生词的意思。

sentences.en: I use a dictionary when I don't know a word's definition.
sentences.zh: 当我不知道一个单词的定义时，我会用词典。

sentences.en: This is his book.
His name is Tom.
This is my mine.
I found a mine.
The book on the desk is hers.
Is this red bag hers?
sentences.zh: 这个红色的包是她的吗？

sentences.en: She made an excuse for being late.
He needs a good excuse to leave early.
sentences.zh: 他需要一个好借口早点离开。

sentences.en: Me and my friend play together.
This is me, a happy student.
sentences.zh: 这是我，一个快乐的学生。

sentences.en: Excuse me, could you tell me where the library is?
sentences.zh: 打扰一下，你能告诉我图书馆在哪里吗？

sentences.en: She said 'excuse me' when she accidentally bumped into him.
sentences.zh: 当她不小心撞到他时，她说了声“打扰一下”。

sentences.en: I want to thank my parents for their support.
She always says thank you when someone helps her.
sentences.zh: 当有人帮助她时，她总是说谢谢。

sentences.en: My teacher is very kind.
I learn a lot from my teacher.
sentences.zh: 我从我的老师那里学到很多。

sentences.en: This book is about animals.
Can you tell me about your hobby?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我关于你的爱好吗？

zh: （询问消息或提出建议）??怎么样？??好吗？

sentences.en: What about going to the park?
What about this red apple?
Is this book yours?
The red pen is yours.
sentences.zh: 这支红色的钢笔是你的。

sentences.en: I study hard for my dream.
sentences.zh: 我为了我的梦想努力学习。

sentences.en: She bought a gift for her mother.
sentences.zh: 她为她妈妈买了一份礼物。

sentences.en: Thank you for your help.
Thank you for coming to my party.
sentences.zh: 感谢你来参加我的派对。

sentences.en: Can you help me with my homework?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我做家庭作业吗？

sentences.en: I need your help to carry this box.
sentences.zh: 我需要你的帮助来搬这个箱子。

sentences.en: Welcome to our class!
They welcome the new teacher happily.
sentences.zh: 他们高兴地欢迎新老师。

sentences.en: A: Thank you for helping me! B: You're welcome.
When someone says 'Thank you', you can reply 'You're welcome'.
sentences.zh: 当有人说“谢谢”时，你可以回答“不客气”。

sentences.en: Baseball is a popular sport played with a bat and ball.
sentences.zh: 棒球是一项用球棒和球进行的流行运动。

sentences.en: He enjoys playing baseball with his friends on weekends.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢在周末和朋友们一起打棒球。

sentences.en: I wear a watch on my wrist.
sentences.zh: 我手腕上戴着一块手表。

sentences.en: He checks the time with his watch.
I use a computer to do my homework.
The computer is on the desk.
We play a game in the park.
My favorite game is chess.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的游戏是象棋。

sentences.en: I need a card to write a message.
sentences.zh: 我需要一张卡片来写留言。

sentences.en: She gave me a beautiful birthday card.
sentences.zh: 她给了我一张漂亮的生日贺卡。

sentences.en: You need to show your ID card when boarding the plane.
sentences.zh: 登机时你需要出示你的身份证。

sentences.en: My ID card contains my personal information.
sentences.zh: 我的身份证包含我的个人信息。

sentences.en: I write notes in my notebook.
sentences.zh: 我在我的笔记本上写笔记。

sentences.en: She bought a new notebook for school.
sentences.zh: 她为上学买了一个新笔记本。

sentences.en: I hear a ring at the door.
She wears a beautiful ring on her finger.
sentences.zh: 她手指上戴着一枚漂亮的戒指。

sentences.en: I carry my books in a bag.
She put her pencil case into the bag.
sentences.zh: 她把铅笔盒放进了书包里。

sentences.en: I live in a big house.
She is in the classroom now.
I often go to the library to read books.
The library has many interesting storybooks.
sentences.zh: 图书馆有很多有趣的故事书。

sentences.en: May I ask a question?
She likes to ask her teacher for help.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢向她的老师寻求帮助。

sentences.en: I need to ask for help.
She went to ask for directions.
I need to find my book.
Can you help me find the key?
I need some water.
There are some books on the desk.
We study in the classroom every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天在教室里学习。

sentences.en: The teacher is writing on the blackboard in the classroom.
sentences.zh: 老师正在教室里的黑板上写字。

zh: （=email）给??发电子邮件；用电邮发送；电子邮件

sentences.en: I sent an email to my friend yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天给我的朋友发了一封电子邮件。

sentences.en: Please check your email for the meeting invitation.
sentences.zh: 请查看你的电子邮件获取会议邀请。

zh: （提供电话号码等时使用）按照；根据；在（某处、某时间或时刻）

sentences.en: I am at home.
She arrives at school.
I will call my friend.
sentences.zh: 我会给我的朋友打电话。

sentences.en: She likes to call her mom every day.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢每天给她妈妈打电话。

sentences.en: I can't find my keys; they are lost.
sentences.zh: 我找不到我的钥匙了；它们丢了。

sentences.en: She looked everywhere for her lost phone.
sentences.zh: 她到处找她丢失的手机。

sentences.en: You must finish your homework on time.
We must follow the school rules.
sentences.zh: 我们必须遵守学校规则。

sentences.en: I need to set the table for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我需要摆放餐具准备晚餐。

sentences.en: Can you help me set the clock to the correct time?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我把时钟调到正确时间吗？

sentences.en: She bought a set of colorful pens.
There is a set of keys on the desk.

phrases.en: Where did you put the book?

sentences.en: Where is my book?
Where do you live?
A table is a piece of furniture with a flat top and legs.
sentences.zh: 桌子是一种有平顶和腿的家具。

sentences.en: We put books and pens on the table.
sentences.zh: 我们把书和笔放在桌子上。

sentences.en: I sleep in a bed every night.
The bed in my room is big.
The bookcase is filled with many storybooks.
sentences.zh: 这个书架上摆满了许多故事书。

sentences.en: I put my new English book on the bookcase.
sentences.zh: 我把我的新英语书放在了书架上。

sentences.en: I sit on the sofa to watch TV.
The sofa in the living room is blue.
sentences.zh: 客厅里的沙发是蓝色的。

sentences.en: Please sit on the chair.
The chair is made of wood.
The light is on.
I put on my coat.
The cat is under the table.
I found my pen under the chair.
sentences.zh: 我在椅子下面找到了我的钢笔。

sentences.en: Please come here.
I will come to your party.
Come on, let's finish the homework together.
sentences.zh: 加油，让我们一起完成作业吧。

sentences.en: Come on, you can pass the exam!
I put my books on the desk.
The teacher's desk is in front of the classroom.
sentences.zh: 老师的书桌在教室前面。

sentences.en: I think you are right.
She likes to think before acting.
I clean my room every day.
She is reading a book in the room.
They put their books on the desk.
sentences.zh: 他们把他们的书放在桌子上。

sentences.en: The children love their new toys.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢他们的新玩具。

sentences.en: She wears a red hat.
sentences.zh: 她戴着一顶红色的帽子。

sentences.en: My hat is on the table.
The head is on top of the body.
I use my head to think.
Yeah, I understand the question now.
sentences.zh: 是的，我现在理解这个问题了。

sentences.en: She nodded and said, 'Yeah, that's right.'
I know your name.
Do you know this word?
I listen to the radio every morning.
My father bought a new radio yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸昨天买了一台新收音机。

sentences.en: I can tell the time with a clock.
The clock on the wall is round.
I need a tape to wrap the gift.
sentences.zh: 我需要胶带用来包装礼物。

sentences.en: The tape is sticky on one side.
The player scored a goal.
sentences.zh: 这个运动员进了一个球。

sentences.en: She is a good tennis player.
sentences.zh: 她是一名优秀的网球运动员。

sentences.en: I use a tape player to listen to music.
sentences.zh: 我用磁带播放机听音乐。

sentences.en: The tape player is on the desk.
This is a model car.
She made a model of a house.
sentences.zh: 她做了一个房子的模型。

sentences.en: The plane flies high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 飞机在天空中飞得很高。

sentences.en: We take a plane to travel to Beijing.
sentences.zh: 我们乘飞机去北京旅行。

sentences.en: He flies his model plane in the park.
sentences.zh: 他在公园里放他的模型飞机。

sentences.en: My brother made a model plane by himself.
sentences.zh: 我哥哥自己做了一个模型飞机。

sentences.en: Please tidy your desk before class.
sentences.zh: 上课前请整理你的书桌。

sentences.en: She likes to keep her room tidy and clean.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢保持她的房间整洁干净。

sentences.en: I wanted to go out, but it started raining.
sentences.zh: 我想出去，但是开始下雨了。

sentences.en: She is small but very strong.
This is our classroom.
Our teacher is very kind.
Flowers grow everywhere in the garden.
People can see trees everywhere in the park.
sentences.zh: 人们在公园里到处都能看到树。

sentences.en: I always brush my teeth in the morning.
She always helps her friends when they need it.
sentences.zh: 当朋友们需要时，她总是帮助他们。

zh: （第三人称单数形式does）用于构成否定句和疑问句；做；干

sentences.en: I can do my homework.
Do you like apples?
I have a book.
They have two apples.
I like playing tennis with my friends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和朋友们一起打网球。

sentences.en: Tennis is a popular sport around the world.
sentences.zh: 网球是一项在全世界流行的运动。

sentences.en: I like to play with a ball.
The ball is red and round.
We often play pingpong after school.
sentences.zh: 我们经常放学后打乒乓球。

sentences.en: Pingpong is a popular sport in China.
sentences.zh: 乒乓球在中国是一项受欢迎的运动。

sentences.en: A bat can fly at night.
He used a bat to hit the ball.
He likes playing soccer with his friends.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢和朋友们踢足球。

sentences.en: Soccer is a popular sport around the world.
sentences.zh: 足球是世界上受欢迎的运动。

sentences.en: I like playing with a soccer ball.
The soccer ball is black and white.
sentences.zh: 这个足球是黑白相间的。

sentences.en: I like playing volleyball with my friends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和朋友们一起打排球。

sentences.en: Volleyball is a popular team sport.
sentences.zh: 排球是一项受欢迎的团队运动。

sentences.en: I like playing basketball with my friends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和朋友们一起打篮球。

sentences.en: Basketball is a popular sport around the world.
sentences.zh: 篮球是一项在全世界受欢迎的运动。

sentences.en: Hey, how are you today?
She said hey to her friend.
sentences.zh: 她向她的朋友说了声嘿。

sentences.en: Let me help you.
Let us go to school.
The capital of the US is Washington D.C.
sentences.zh: 美国的首都是华盛顿哥伦比亚特区。

sentences.en: People in the US speak English.
Let's go to the park.
Let's read a book together.
Let's go to the park.
I can go to school by bus.
sentences.zh: 我可以乘公交车去上学。

sentences.en: We are a team.
We like to play games.
I am late for school.
He was late because of the rain.
She has a red apple.
They have new books.
I need to get a book from the library.
sentences.zh: 我需要从图书馆拿一本书。

sentences.en: Can you help me get my pen?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我拿一下我的钢笔吗？

sentences.en: She did a great job on her project.
sentences.zh: 她在她的项目上做得非常出色。

sentences.en: We had a great time at the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天在公园玩得很开心。

sentences.en: We play football in the park.
She likes to play games with her friends.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢和朋友们玩游戏。

sentences.en: I can hear a sound.
The sound is very loud.
This story is interesting.
She finds math class interesting.
The movie was so boring that I fell asleep.
sentences.zh: 这部电影太无聊了，我都睡着了。

sentences.en: She finds studying math boring and prefers art class.
sentences.zh: 她觉得学数学很无聊，更喜欢美术课。

zh: 有趣的；使人快乐的；乐趣；快乐

sentences.en: Playing games is fun.
We had fun at the park.
sentences.zh: 我们在公园玩得很开心。

sentences.en: Learning a new language can be difficult.
sentences.zh: 学习一门新语言可能很难。

sentences.en: She found it difficult to solve the math problem.
sentences.zh: 她发现解这道数学题很难。

sentences.en: Listening to soft music is very relaxing.
sentences.zh: 听轻音乐非常令人放松。

sentences.en: She finds reading books relaxing after work.
sentences.zh: 她发现在下班后读书很放松。

sentences.en: I watch TV every evening.
He wears a watch on his left wrist.
sentences.zh: 他左手腕上戴着一块手表。

sentences.en: I watch TV every evening.
The TV is on the table.
I like to watch TV in the evening.
She often watches TV after finishing homework.
sentences.zh: 她经常在完成作业后看电视。

sentences.en: My book is the same as yours.
We have the same hobby.
Love is a warm feeling between people.
sentences.zh: 爱是人与人之间一种温暖的情感。

sentences.en: We should spread love to make the world better.
sentences.zh: 我们应该传播爱，让世界变得更美好。

sentences.en: I go to school with my friend.
sentences.zh: 我和我的朋友一起去上学。

sentences.en: She writes a letter with a pen.
I like to play sport every day.
Swimming is a popular sport in summer.
sentences.zh: 游泳是夏天一项受欢迎的运动。

sentences.en: I gave them a book.
They are my friends, and I like them.
sentences.zh: 他们是我的朋友，我喜欢他们。

sentences.en: There is only one apple on the table.
She wants only a glass of water.
I like apples.
She likes reading books.
This problem is easy for me.
sentences.zh: 这个问题对我来说很简单。

sentences.en: She finds it easy to learn English.
I will go to the park after lunch.
She always does homework after school.
We have English class in the morning.
My favorite class is math.
I play basketball with my classmate after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我和我的同学一起打篮球。

sentences.en: My classmate helps me with my math homework.
sentences.zh: 我的同学帮我做数学作业。

sentences.en: I like to eat a banana.
The banana is yellow.
I want to eat a hamburger for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我午餐想吃一个汉堡包。

sentences.en: He bought a hamburger from the fast food restaurant.
sentences.zh: 他从快餐店买了一个汉堡包。

sentences.en: I like eating tomato.
The tomato is red.
I like to eat icecream in summer.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在夏天吃冰淇淋。

sentences.en: She bought a vanilla icecream from the shop.
sentences.zh: 她从商店买了一个香草冰淇淋。

sentences.en: I like to eat salad for lunch.
Salad is made with fresh vegetables.
sentences.zh: 沙拉是用新鲜蔬菜做的。

sentences.en: I like to eat fresh strawberries in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天我喜欢吃新鲜的草莓。

sentences.en: The strawberry cake on the table looks delicious.
sentences.zh: 桌子上的草莓蛋糕看起来很美味。

sentences.en: I like to eat a juicy pear.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢吃一个多汁的梨。

sentences.en: The pear on the table is yellow.
I drink milk for breakfast.
Milk is good for our health.
sentences.zh: 牛奶对我们的健康有益。

sentences.en: I eat bread for breakfast.
She likes to put butter on her bread.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在面包上涂黄油。

sentences.en: My birthday is in June.
We have a party on his birthday.
sentences.zh: 我们在他生日那天举办派对。

sentences.en: We usually have dinner at 7 p.m.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在晚上7点吃晚餐。

sentences.en: My favorite food for dinner is fish.
sentences.zh: 我晚餐最喜欢的食物是鱼。

sentences.en: There are seven days in a week.
I go to school from Monday to Friday every week.
sentences.zh: 我每周从周一到周五去上学。

sentences.en: I need to think about my homework.
sentences.zh: 我需要思考我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: She likes to think about her future.
I like to eat healthy food every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天吃健康的食物。

sentences.en: We need food to give us energy and grow.
sentences.zh: 我们需要食物来给我们提供能量和促进生长。

sentences.en: Sure, I will help you with your homework.
sentences.zh: 当然，我会帮你做家庭作业。

sentences.en: She said sure when I asked for help.
sentences.zh: 当我请求帮助时，她说当然可以。

sentences.en: How about going to the park tomorrow?
How about a cup of tea?
I ate a delicious burger for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我午餐吃了一个美味的汉堡。

sentences.en: He likes to put cheese on his burger.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢在他的汉堡上放奶酪。

sentences.en: I eat a vegetable salad every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天吃一份蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.en: My mother grows many vegetables in the garden.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈在花园里种了很多蔬菜。

sentences.en: An apple is a kind of fruit.
I like to eat fresh fruit every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天吃新鲜的水果。

sentences.en: The answer is right.
Turn right at the corner.
I eat an apple every day.
The apple is red and sweet.
I will go to the park then.
Finish your homework first, then play games.
sentences.zh: 先完成你的作业，然后玩游戏。

sentences.en: I ate an egg for breakfast.
The egg is white and oval.
sentences.zh: 这个鸡蛋是白色且椭圆形的。

sentences.en: I like to eat a carrot.
The rabbit is eating a carrot.
I eat rice every day.
Rice is a common food in Asia.
sentences.zh: 米饭是亚洲常见的食物。

sentences.en: I like eating chicken for dinner.
The chicken is walking on the farm.
I like apples, so I eat one every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢苹果，所以我每天吃一个。

sentences.en: He studied hard, so he passed the exam.
sentences.zh: 他学习很努力，所以通过了考试。

sentences.en: I eat breakfast every morning.
Breakfast is an important meal of the day.
sentences.zh: 早餐是一天中重要的一餐。

sentences.en: I eat lunch at noon every day.
We usually have lunch in the school cafeteria.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在学校食堂吃午饭。

sentences.en: The bright star shines in the night sky.
sentences.zh: 明亮的星星在夜空中闪耀。

sentences.en: We can see a star twinkling above us.
sentences.zh: 我们能看到一颗星星在我们头顶闪烁。

sentences.en: I eat apples every morning.
They eat dinner at seven o'clock.
Well, I understand your question now.
sentences.zh: 嗯，我现在明白你的问题了。

sentences.en: The well in the village provides clean water.
sentences.zh: 村里的井提供干净的水。

sentences.en: Reading books every day is a good habit.
sentences.zh: 每天读书是一个好习惯。

sentences.en: He is trying to break his bad habit of staying up late.
sentences.zh: 他正在努力改掉熬夜的坏习惯。

sentences.en: Eating vegetables keeps you healthy.
Exercise every day is good for a healthy life.
sentences.zh: 每天锻炼对健康的生活有好处。

sentences.en: He is really happy today.
This book is really interesting.
I want an apple.
Do you want to play?
I am a student.
They are happy.
Eating too much fat can make you gain weight.
sentences.zh: 吃太多脂肪会让你变胖。

sentences.en: Butter and oil are high in fat.
There is much water in the bottle.
She has much homework to do today.
sentences.zh: 她今天有很多作业要做。

sentences.en: How much does this book cost?
How much time do we have left?
I need to put on my sock before wearing shoes.
sentences.zh: 穿鞋前我需要穿上袜子。

sentences.en: My sock is blue and has a small pattern.
sentences.zh: 我的袜子是蓝色的，上面有小图案。

sentences.en: I like wearing a Tshirt in summer.
This Tshirt is blue and white.
He likes wearing shorts in summer.
These shorts are blue and white.
sentences.zh: 这条短裤是蓝白相间的。

sentences.en: She wears a warm sweater in winter.
sentences.zh: 她冬天穿一件暖和的毛衣。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new sweater.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈给我买了一件新毛衣。

sentences.en: He wears blue trousers today.
sentences.zh: 他今天穿了蓝色的裤子。

sentences.en: My trousers are too long for me.
sentences.zh: 我的裤子对我来说太长了。

sentences.en: I wear a shoe on my foot.
She bought a new shoe yesterday.
She wears a beautiful skirt today.
sentences.zh: 她今天穿了一条漂亮的裙子。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new skirt.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈给我买了一条新裙子。

zh: 元（美国、加拿大等国的货币单位，符号为$）

sentences.en: I need one dollar to buy a candy.
sentences.zh: 我需要一美元买一块糖果。

sentences.en: The price of this book is five dollars.
sentences.zh: 这本书的价格是五美元。

sentences.en: The elephant is very big.
My room has a big window.
sentences.zh: 我的房间有一扇大窗户。

sentences.en: The cat is small.
I have a small apple.
The book is short.
He has short hair.
The river is long.
She has long hair.
The woman is walking in the park.
sentences.zh: 这位女士正在公园里散步。

sentences.en: My mother is a kind woman.
sentences.zh: 我的妈妈是一位善良的女士。

sentences.en: When someone needs assistance, you can say 'Can I help you?'.
sentences.zh: 当有人需要帮助时，你可以说“Can I help you?”。

sentences.en: The sentence 'Can I help you?' is often used to offer help politely.
sentences.zh: 句子“Can I help you?”常用于礼貌地提供帮助。

sentences.en: I need a pen to write.
We need to study hard.
Look at the blackboard, please.
I like to look at stars at night.
A pair of shoes is under the bed.
She bought a new pair of gloves.
Please take this book to the library.
sentences.zh: 请把这本书带到图书馆去。

sentences.en: I need to take my umbrella because it's raining.
sentences.zh: 因为下雨了，我需要带上我的雨伞。

sentences.en: Here you are. This is your book.
Here you are. Here's your pen.
I have ten apples.
There are ten students in the classroom.
There are eleven apples on the table.
My brother is eleven years old.
There are twelve months in a year.
She is twelve years old.
There are thirteen apples on the table.
My brother is thirteen years old.
There are fifteen apples on the table.
She is fifteen years old this year.
There are eighteen apples in the basket.
She is eighteen years old today.
There are twenty students in the classroom.
I need twenty pencils for the art class.
sentences.zh: 美术课我需要二十支铅笔。

sentences.en: There are thirty students in the classroom.
My mother is thirty years old.

zh: （用于男子的姓氏或姓名前）先生

sentences.en: Mr. Smith is a kind teacher.
sentences.zh: 史密斯先生是一位和蔼的老师。

sentences.en: I saw Mr. Brown at the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天在公园看到了布朗先生。

sentences.en: I need to buy new clothes for winter.
sentences.zh: 我需要为冬天买新衣服。

sentences.en: She likes to wear colorful clothes.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢穿色彩鲜艳的衣服。

sentences.en: I go to the store to buy food.
The store is near my home.
I want to buy a book.
She will buy some apples.
The store is having a big sale today.
sentences.zh: 这家商店今天正在进行大促销。

sentences.en: I bought this shirt at a sale for 50% off.
sentences.zh: 我在促销时以五折买了这件衬衫。

sentences.en: I want to sell my old books.
She plans to sell vegetables at the market.
All students should study hard.
sentences.zh: 所有学生都应该努力学习。

sentences.en: All books on the shelf are interesting.
sentences.zh: 书架上所有的书都很有趣。

sentences.en: The cake is very delicious.
She runs very fast.
The price of the book is ten dollars.
sentences.zh: 这本书的价格是十美元。

sentences.en: Can you tell me the price of this shirt?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我这件衬衫的价格吗？

sentences.en: The boy is playing football in the park.
sentences.zh: 那个男孩正在公园里踢足球。

sentences.en: My little brother is a clever boy.
sentences.zh: 我的弟弟是一个聪明的男孩。

sentences.en: She bought a pair of shoes yesterday.
I need a pair of scissors to cut the paper.
sentences.zh: 我需要一把剪刀来剪纸。

sentences.en: When is your birthday?
When do you usually get up?
There are twelve months in a year.
My birthday is in the month of July.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在七月这个月份。

sentences.en: January is the first month of the year.
sentences.zh: 一月是一年中的第一个月。

sentences.en: We often celebrate New Year's Day in January.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在一月庆祝元旦。

sentences.en: February is the second month of the year.
sentences.zh: 二月是一年中的第二个月。

sentences.en: Valentine's Day is in February.
March is the third month of the year.
sentences.zh: 三月是一年中的第三个月。

sentences.en: We often plant trees in March.
April is the fourth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 四月是一年中的第四个月。

sentences.en: We often have spring outings in April.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在四月去春游。

sentences.en: May is the fifth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 五月是一年中的第五个月份。

sentences.en: My birthday is in May.
June is the sixth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 六月是一年中的第六个月份。

sentences.en: My birthday is in June.
July is the seventh month of the year.
sentences.zh: 七月是一年中的第七个月。

sentences.en: My birthday is in July.
August is the eighth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 八月是一年中的第八个月份。

sentences.en: We often have summer vacation in August.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在八月放暑假。

sentences.en: September is the ninth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 九月是一年中的第九个月份。

sentences.en: My birthday is in September.
October is the tenth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 十月是一年中的第十个月份。

sentences.en: Halloween is celebrated in October.
November is the eleventh month of the year.
sentences.zh: 十一月是一年中的第十一个月。

sentences.en: Thanksgiving Day is usually in November in the United States.
sentences.zh: 美国的感恩节通常在十一月。

sentences.en: December is the twelfth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 十二月是一年中的第十二个月份。

sentences.en: Christmas is celebrated in December.
She looks very happy today.
Playing with friends makes me happy.
sentences.zh: 和朋友们一起玩让我很开心。

sentences.en: We say 'Happy birthday!' to someone on their birthday.
sentences.zh: 我们在某人的生日时对他们说“生日快乐！”。

sentences.en: My friend smiled and said 'Happy birthday!' when I entered the room.
sentences.zh: 当我进入房间时，我的朋友笑着说“生日快乐！”。

sentences.en: The old man likes reading books.
My cat is old but very lovely.
sentences.zh: 我的猫年纪大了但很可爱。

sentences.en: How old is your brother?
Can you tell me how old she is?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我她多大了吗？

sentences.en: We will have a party this weekend.
sentences.zh: 这个周末我们将举办一场聚会。

sentences.en: She brought a cake to the party.
sentences.zh: 她带了一个蛋糕去聚会。

sentences.en: When you leave, you can say 'See you!'.
sentences.zh: 当你离开时，你可以说“See you!”。

sentences.en: My friend waved and said 'See you!' before leaving.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友离开前挥了挥手说“See you!”。

sentences.en: The first day of school is exciting.
sentences.zh: 开学第一天很令人兴奋。

sentences.en: He was the first to finish the race.
sentences.zh: 他是第一个完成比赛的人。

sentences.en: I will be there in a second.
A minute has sixty seconds.
He got the third place in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得了第三名。

sentences.en: This is the third time I have visited Beijing.
sentences.zh: 这是我第三次参观北京。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the fifth of May.
He finished fifth in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得第五名。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the eighth of July.
He finished eighth in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得第八名。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the ninth of July.
He finished ninth in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得第九名。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the twelfth of March.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在三月十二日。

sentences.en: He finished twelfth in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得第十二名。

sentences.en: The twentieth century saw many great inventions.
sentences.zh: 二十世纪见证了许多伟大的发明。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the twentieth of July.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在七月二十日。

sentences.en: This is a test.
Let's do a test.
I went on a trip to the mountains last summer.
sentences.zh: 去年夏天我去山里旅行了。

sentences.en: We need to pack our bags for the trip tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为明天的旅行收拾行李。

sentences.en: Art is a beautiful form of expression.
sentences.zh: 艺术是一种美丽的表达形式。

sentences.en: We learn about art in our school classes.
sentences.zh: 我们在学校的课堂上学习艺术。

sentences.en: We celebrate many festivals in a year.
sentences.zh: 我们一年中庆祝很多节日。

sentences.en: Christmas is a popular festival in Western countries.
sentences.zh: 圣诞节是西方国家一个受欢迎的节日。

sentences.en: Dear teacher, may I ask a question?
sentences.zh: 亲爱的老师，我可以问个问题吗？

sentences.en: She wrote a dear letter to her friend.
sentences.zh: 她给她的朋友写了一封亲切的信。

sentences.en: I am a student.
The student is reading a book.
I have a thing.
What is this thing?
A term is a word or phrase used to describe something in a particular subject.
sentences.zh: 术语是在特定学科中用于描述事物的词或短语。

sentences.en: We need to learn this new term for the science test tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为明天的科学考试学习这个新术语。

sentences.en: She is busy with her homework.
My father is busy working in the office.
sentences.zh: 我的爸爸正在办公室忙着工作。

sentences.en: What time is it now?
I check the time on my phone.
We often say 'Have a good time!' to friends before they travel.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在朋友旅行前对他们说“玩得开心！”。

sentences.en: When someone is going to a party, you can tell them 'Have a good time!'.
sentences.zh: 当有人要去参加派对时，你可以告诉他们“玩得开心！”。

sentences.en: She is standing over there.
Look, the book is there on the table.
My favorite color is blue.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的颜色是蓝色。

sentences.en: Reading books is his favorite hobby.
sentences.zh: 读书是他最喜欢的爱好。

sentences.en: The subject of the sentence is what the sentence is about.
sentences.zh: 句子的主语是句子所描述的对象。

sentences.en: In the sentence 'Alice runs fast', 'Alice' is the subject.
sentences.zh: 在句子“Alice runs fast”中，“Alice”是主语。

sentences.en: I love learning science.
Science helps us understand the world.
sentences.zh: 科学帮助我们了解世界。

sentences.en: We have P.E. class on Monday.
I like playing basketball in P.E. class.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在体育课上打篮球。

sentences.en: I like listening to music.
Music can make me happy.
Math is the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns.
sentences.zh: 数学是对数字、形状和模式的研究。

sentences.en: We learn to add, subtract, multiply, and divide in math class.
sentences.zh: 我们在数学课上学习加、减、乘、除。

zh: 语文；汉语；汉语的；中国的

sentences.en: Chinese is my favorite subject.
sentences.zh: 语文是我最喜欢的科目。

sentences.en: I am learning Chinese now.
Geography studies the Earth's landscapes, peoples, and environments.
sentences.zh: 地理学研究地球的景观、民族和环境。

sentences.en: Learning geography helps us understand different countries and their cultures.
sentences.zh: 学习地理帮助我们了解不同的国家及其文化。

sentences.en: I like learning history.
History tells us many stories.
sentences.zh: 历史告诉我们很多故事。

sentences.en: Why are you late for class?
She always asks why the sky is blue.
sentences.zh: 她总是问为什么天空是蓝色的。

sentences.en: I study hard because I want to learn more.
sentences.zh: 我努力学习是因为我想学到更多知识。

sentences.en: She was late because the bus was delayed.
sentences.zh: 她迟到了，因为公交车晚点了。

sentences.en: We go to school on Monday.
Monday is the first day of the week in some countries.
sentences.zh: 在一些国家，星期一是一周的第一天。

sentences.en: Friday is the sixth day of the week.
sentences.zh: 星期五是一周的第六天。

sentences.en: We often have a math test on Friday.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在星期五有数学测试。

sentences.en: We often go shopping on Saturday.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在星期六去购物。

sentences.en: Saturday is the last day of the week in some countries.
sentences.zh: 在一些国家，星期六是一周的最后一天。

sentences.en: A: Are you coming to the party? B: For sure!
She will for sure pass the exam with all her hard work.
sentences.zh: 凭借她的努力，她肯定会通过考试。

sentences.en: The park is free for children.
You can get a free gift today.
sentences.zh: 今天你可以得到一份免费礼物。

sentences.en: The ice cream is cool.
He wears a cool hat.
sentences.zh: 他戴着一顶很酷的帽子。

sentences.en: Today is Tuesday.
We have math class on Tuesday.
Wednesday comes after Tuesday and before Thursday.
sentences.zh: 星期三在星期二之后，星期四之前。

sentences.en: We have a math class on Wednesday morning.
sentences.zh: 我们星期三上午有一节数学课。

sentences.en: Thursday is the fifth day of the week.
sentences.zh: 星期四是一周的第五天。

sentences.en: We have a math class on Thursday.
sentences.zh: 我们星期四有一节数学课。

sentences.en: We often go to the park on Sunday.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在星期日去公园。

sentences.en: Sunday is the first day of the week in many countries.
sentences.zh: 在许多国家，星期日是一周的第一天。

sentences.en: A.M. refers to the time from midnight to noon.
sentences.zh: A.M.指的是从午夜到中午的时间。

sentences.en: We usually have breakfast in the A.M.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在上午吃早餐。

sentences.en: P.M. stands for post meridiem, which refers to the time from noon to midnight.
sentences.zh: P.M.代表午后，指的是从中午到午夜的时间。

sentences.en: We usually have dinner at 7 P.M. in the evening.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在晚上7点（P.M.）吃晚餐。

sentences.en: This book is useful for learning English.
sentences.zh: 这本书对学习英语很有用。

sentences.en: Her advice was very useful to me.
sentences.zh: 她的建议对我非常有用。

sentences.en: The letter 'a' comes from the alphabet.
I received a gift from my friend.
sentences.zh: 我收到了一份来自我朋友的礼物。

sentences.en: I go from home to school every day.
She moves from the chair to the sofa.

zh: （用于女子的姓氏或姓名前）太太；夫人

sentences.en: Mrs. Smith is my English teacher.
sentences.zh: 史密斯夫人是我的英语老师。

sentences.en: I will visit Mrs. Brown tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我明天要去拜访布朗夫人。

sentences.en: I need to finish my homework.
Did you finish reading the book?
We have an English lesson today.
sentences.zh: 我们今天有一节英语课。

sentences.en: I like this math lesson very much.
sentences.zh: 我非常喜欢这节数学课。

sentences.en: An hour has sixty minutes.
I usually exercise for an hour every morning.
sentences.zh: 我通常每天早上锻炼一小时。
